name: Campusbooks4less
tag_list: search, books, online-price-comparison, amazon, ebay, barnes-and-noble
overview:
We search across many online book retailers to find the lowest prices for a given book.

Our company tries to help anyone in need of a book by finding them the cheapest price available online. Whether a student looking for a textbook, a casual reader looking for a novel, or a programmer looking for a reference book, we provide the user with the ability to search for a particular book that they are interested in, then we find out how much this book costs online. Along with the book price at various online retailers, we also provide the user with shipping information, coupons, and a link to the book at the given retailer. Our search covers online retailers such as Amazon, Barnes and Noble, Half.com, and many others.

In addition to providing a destination portal, we also offer a mobile version of the website along with a native iPhone application (Android app on the way as well). Using these services, a book buyer can be at their local Barnes and Noble or Borders and before buying a book, check it see if it is available cheaper online using their mobile phone. If they find a better deal on the book online, the user can purchase the book directly on the phone.

We are a free service with no annoying ads anywhere on the site. We founded company as a service for students developed by students and we stick to this motto. You can search for books by author, title or keyword, and if you know the ISBN number of the book you are interested in, you can search using that as well. This service will always be free.
